page.title: 03Donview Centre Bennachie
page.content: This centre has been built by the Forestry Commission to encourage the recreational use of Bennachie Forest. There is a car park picnic site and exhibition depicting all the many facets of life in the forest.Growing around the centre are trees of the types seen in the area which have been labelled as a guide to their identification. From the car park a series of walks over the Millstone Hill give spectacular views of the surrounding countryside.A 10km walk will take one across the hills past the Iron age Fort on Mither Tap and down into the Urie valley while the short 1km path provides a brief stroll among the trees. These facilities prove very popular with both local residents and tourists and are crowded in summer.
